00115                 public function summary($relative = TRUE)
00116                 {
00117                         $stripped = $this->get_stripped_text();
00118                         $off = strpos($stripped, " ", min(250, strlen($stripped)));
00119                         if ($off !== FALSE)
00120                         {
00121                                 return substr($stripped, 0, $off) . "&hellip; " .
00122                                         a(l('Read more'), array('href' => $this->permalink($relative)));
00123                         }
00124                         return $stripped;
00125                 }
